observation: Navigating to https://meraserv.com/ returned status code 200

MERA | MERA Service  About MERA® Services Benefits Relationships Coverage Areas FAQs/Resources Contact Us TIMANT MERA MORE WHAT IS MERA? In 1973, MERA® started as twelve independent medical equipment maintenance firms who wanted to share technical expertise and resources…. More--> SERVICES The MERA® Service Process: In 1982 MERA® established flexible service processes that could be individualized to each client’s specific service requirements… BENEFITS MERA® delivers advantages and benefits to our clients and our clients’ customers.  The greater your use of MERA®, the greater our impact in the these areas. RELATIONSHIPS MERA® builds long-term partnerships with each client, and supports each client’s success by leveraging mutual cooperation… Technical Support MERA® TSC supports medical, scientific, and laboratory equipment manufacturers and distributors, and MERA® was the FIRST independent… The Local MERAffiliate MERA® is an exclusive association of independent medical and laboratory repair companies. Membership is by invitation only. … Client – MERA® Success TESTIMONIALS Know the job will be done quickly and correctly.  Consistent documentation and strong adherence to procedures. MERA is responsive and supportive and has genuine interest in solving issues as they arise. We would have far fewer customers without MERA support. Allows us to recognize revenues earlier. Seamless services, resource allocation, and responsiveness. I could not service my customers without them (MERA). Contact Info Sales: 800-953-6372 info@meraserv.net Service Dispatch: 1-800-776-7158 service@meraserv.net Navigation Copyright © 2023 MERA® is the registered service mark of Medical Equipment Repair Associates.
